mapper.select: SELECT book.id, isbn, text_book_name, text_book_category, press, author, unit_price, teacher_book_number, award_Information, publication_date, subscriber, subscriber_tel, is_book_purchase, reason, course_id, discount_id, affairs_number, login_user_id, is_buy_book, book_status.gmt_modified, book_status.gmt_create, plan_id FROM book, book_status WHERE book.plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND book.id = book_status.id
